title: Russian emergency services train at Kaliningrad World Cup stadium
text:
Russian emergency services train at Kaliningrad World Cup stadium 5:48pm GMT - 01:06 
Russian emergency services carried out security exercises at Kaliningrad World Cup stadium on Friday. Rescuers practiced cooperation between medical service team and fire squads, and also tested the new equipment provided to the local ministry for the tournament. (Rough cut. No reporter narration.)
